GenericConnectorDescriptor.description: This connector provides access to the ParseHub API. For more information, click here: https://www.parsehub.com/docs/ref/api/v2/

field.label: Override OpenAPI Spec
field.helpText: To override the specification included with the connector, enter a URL pointing to a JSON or YAML specification. Example: https://exampledocumentation.com/spec.yaml
